timeline.message: Issue #7742: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - LambdaParameterName

timeline.bodyText: Please use this variable in statement before
timeline.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText: first group in regex is redundant, can be simplified to just underscore
timeline.author: strkkk

replies.bodyText:
@Abhishek-kumar09 there is a misunderstanding. By first group I meant [_], this group can be simplified to _, no reason to delete rest of regex.
Please correct to ^_[a-zA-Z0-9]*$
replies.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
Inputs between the 2 should be more unique.
Please add a parenthesis around the lambda parameter like 
  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/naming/lambdaparametername/InputLambdaParameterName.java
    
    
         Line 10
      in
      3835575
